question: [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/sigma_protocol/homomorphism/fixed_base_msms.rs] [Trait documentation] [Sigma protocol soundness] Does the Î£-protocol implementation using this trait achieve knowledge soundness, or can attacker create valid-looking proofs without knowing the witness? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/sigma_protocol/homomorphism/fixed_base_msms.rs] [Trait documentation] [Zero-knowledge property] Does the trait implementation preserve zero-knowledge, or can verifier extract information about secret witnesses from MsmInput structures? (High)
